# cameraProfiles

**Instance Property**

An array of camera profiles implemented by the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
var cameraProfiles: [HMCameraProfile]? { get }
```

## Discussion

An accessory can contain one or more cameras. Each camera is represented as a an [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCameraProfile] instance. If the accessory doesn’t contain a camera, this property is `nil`.

## Managing camera profiles

- **CameraView**: A SwiftUI view into which a video stream or an image snapshot is rendered.
- **HMCameraProfile**: A camera profile that interacts with an accessory’s camera.
- **HMCameraView**: The view into which a video stream or an image snapshot is rendered.
